parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player does not have the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the starting point leading to the room or location containing an item. Separate the path by ','. Example: 'home,living room,bedroom'.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player picks up the item guided by the 'directions' parameter.

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.answer: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output after the player obtains the item.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.answer: A path from the room where the player just picked up an item towards victory. Separate the path by ','. Example: '..,..,..,forest'.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player wins the game.

parameter.name: exit_command
parameter.answer: The exit game command or selection number at the main menu to exit the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: The expected output when the player exits the game.
